tool_description: Verify if an email address is valid.  Email Validation avoids email marketing delivery issues.
name: Email Address Verification
title: Email Address Verification

api_list.name: Bulk request
api_list.description: Lookup several EMAILs at once (up to 50 per request)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://email-address-verification3.p.rapidapi.com/v1/verify"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "email-address-verification3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://email-address-verification3.p.rapidapi.com/v1/verify"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "email-address-verification3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
